contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 17, 1980 D NWABBA Contest (Second Section)
NWABBA Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest north-west-association-contest-second-section
Scheherazade
Bolton Town Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK Test Pieces : Choice of Concert Overture by Tausky or Scheherazade by Rimsky Korsakov. Prizes - 1st £100 and cup, 2nd £50 and trophy, 3rd £30 and trophy, 4th £20. 9 bands competed.
June 22, 2011, 8:01 p.m. March 29, 2020, noon
1 Greenalls Band Jim Pearson
2 Walkden Band E. Vint
3 Congleton Brass Granville Jennings
4 Mossley Band Roy Waite
5 Trafford Band Geoffrey Seals
6 British Aerospace (Chadderton) Charles Holt
7 Colwyn Borough Band Frank Boylin
8 Skelmersdale Prize Band Jack Withington
9 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Alan Marsh
